text: Paramu Mafongoya is a Zimbabwean professor at the University of KwaZulu-Natal (UKZN) in South Africa, where he specialises in agriculture, earth and environmental sciences. He serves as the South African Research Chair (SARChI) in Agronomy and Rural Development at UKZN. == References == Category:1961 births Category:Zimbabwean people Category:Academics Category:Environmentalists
title: Paramu Mafongoya
